column1:
bluelion3,"2011-06-27T08:44:13.583Z","A sub-par Duplo set","

This is my son's first Duplo set.
It has a Zookeeper, a big polar bear, a small polar bear, two penguins, and a fish.
column2: It also has a slide for the animals (or people) and some fence pieces.&nbsp

column1: There is a slope brick with a printing of a polar bear and a map of Greenland.
Having only one figure makes the set a little lonely, with only animals to keep company with the poor

column2: It would be nice to have a visitor or two.&nbsp

column1: The slide is probably the funniest part of the set, but it tends to pop apart or come unmounted.
This set doesn't measure up with some of the better Duplo sets in parts or playability or even price.
It's not bad, but there are better sets.
